last_episode_to_air.name: Tournament of Champions
last_episode_to_air.overview: Winners from throughout the season compete to be crowned Ultimate Wipeout Champion.

name: Wipeout
overview: Human cannonballs! Human pinballs! Crashes, smashes and mud splashes! Twenty-four thrill-seekers will compete in the world's largest extreme obstacle course designed to provide the most spills, face plants and wipeouts ever seen on television.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: This is a comprehensive list of all of the episodes from the first season of American game show Wipeout.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The following is a comprehensive list of episodes from the second season of American game show Wipeout.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The following is a comprehensive listing of all the episodes from the third season of American game show Wipeout.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Here is a comprehensive listing of all of the episodes from the fourth season of American game show Wipeout.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: This is a comprehensive list of all of the episodes from the fifth season of American game-show Wipeout.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: 24 daring new contestants of all ages, shapes and sizes will go head to head through four rounds of grueling and physically demanding but wildly hilarious obstacle courses to win the title of "Wipeout Champion" and the grand prize of $50,000.

episodes.name: July 1, 2008
episodes.overview: The next 24 contestants compete against each other and the clock to make it through wild obstacle courses to ultimately be one of the final 4. The obstacles this week include Slippery Stairs, Foamy Killer Surf, Launch Pads, Big Balls, Dreadmill Door Jam and Sweeper Sack. The final 4 then face the Wipeout Zone. The contestant with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: July 8, 2008
episodes.overview: Twenty-four contestants compete against each other and the clock to make it through wild obstacle courses, including Doughnut Run, Crazy Beams, Pole Vault, Toothbrush Sweeper, Big Balls, Launch Pads, and Sucker Punch, to ultimately be one of the final 4. The final 4 then face the Wipeout Zone. The contestant with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: July 15, 2008
episodes.overview: Twenty four Contestants, including a flight attendant, a professional poker player, a professional bass player, a soccer mom, a DJ, and a nutritionist, compete against each other and the clock through wild obstacles. The Obstacles featured in this episode include Flaming Killer Surf, Tumble Tubes, Wall Swing, Dodge ball Sweeper, Dreadmill Flipper Flop and Barrel Run. The final four will make it to the Wipeout Zone, where the person with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: July 22, 2008
episodes.overview: The next 24 contestants compete against each other and the clock to make it through wild obstacle courses to ultimately be one of the final 4. This weeks obstacles include Dirty Balls, Big Balls, Ball Swing, Sucker Punch, Dizzy Dummy, Barrel Spill and Slippery Snakes. The final 4 then face the Wipeout Zone. The contestant with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: July 29, 2008
episodes.overview: Twenty four contestants, including a former Marine, a software developer, a personal trainer, a pre-school teacher and a bartender compete against each other and the clock through wild obstacles. The obstacles featured in this episode include Buoy Run, Smoking Crowbar Sweeper, Killer Surf, Wrecking Ball Dreadmill, Field Goal Swing and Big Ball. The final four will make it to the Wipeout Zone, where the person with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: Wipey Awards
episodes.overview: "The Wipey's". This week's episode takes a look back at the first six episodes of the season for the first annual Wipey awards. Awards are given in several categories including Best Sucker Punch, Best Sweeper, Best Wipeout on a Non-Obstacle, Favorite Contestant, Dizziest Dummy, Best Big Balls Wipeout and Best Wipeout of the Summer.

episodes.name: August 26, 2008
episodes.overview: Twenty four contestants, including a fire dancer,a pilot, a professor, and a pro-surfer, compete against each other and the clock through wild obstacles. The obstacles featured in this episode include the Topple Towers, Big Balls, Butt Kicker, Donut Stack Swing and Teeter Totter. The final four will make it to the Wipeout Zone, where the person with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: September 9, 2008 (1)
episodes.overview: In this special episode, thirty-two contestants compete against each other and the clock through wild obstacles. The obstacles featured in this episode include the Leap of Faith, Human Pinball, Cookie Cutter, Sucker Punch and Big Balls. The final four will make it to the Wipeout Zone, where the person with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: September 9, 2008 (2)
episodes.overview: Twenty four contestants compete against each other and the clock through wild obstacles. The obstacles featured in this episode include the Goofy Goggles, Bubble Bath Swing, Rolling Logs, Triple Threat and Big Balls. The final four will make it to the Wipeout Zone, where the person with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: September 16, 2008
episodes.overview: This one and a half hour season finale takes a look back at the best moments of the season and includes interviews from past contestants and brand-new, never-before-seen scenes.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: This is a comprehensive list of all of the episodes from the first season of American game show Wipeout.

episodes.name: May 27, 2009
episodes.overview: In the 2nd-season premiere, contestants compete against each other in an extreme obstacle course in Buenos Aires in Argentina. Brand new obstacles include Hurtles, Sweeper Gyro and a Bridge Too Far.

episodes.name: June 3, 2009
episodes.overview: 24 new contestants battle their way through an obstacle course featuring Plank in the Face, Fender Bender, Aqua Launch, Wrecking Ball, Log Roll, King of the Mountain and Raging Rapids with the goal of earning 50,000 dollars.

episodes.name: June 10, 2009 (1)
episodes.overview: 24 new contestants compete against each other all trying to win the title Wipeout Champion and the 50.000 dollars. New obstacles featured include the Rocket, Banana Hammocks, the Catapult into Foam, Gears of Doom with Foam and the Zip Line Swing.

episodes.name: June 10, 2009 (2)
episodes.overview: 24 new contestants are sent to the Wipeout obstacle course in Argentina, where they will face new obstacles including Shish Kabob, Zig Zag Buoy Run and Sack Launch.

episodes.name: June 17, 2009
episodes.overview: 24 new contestants face new obstacles including Rocket With Austronaut, Sweeper Mace, Blades of Fury, the Tropical Bridge and the Icy Swing in order to win 50,000 dollars and get the title "Wipeout Champion".

episodes.name: June 24, 2009
episodes.overview: 24 new contestants face new obstacles including Rocket With Austronaut, Sweeper Mace, Blades of Fury, the Tropical Bridge and the Icy Swing in order to win 50,000 dollars and get the title "Wipeout Champion".

episodes.name: July 1, 2009
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: July 8, 2009: Couples
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: July 15, 2009
episodes.overview: This episode's contestants include a thin music student and a 58-year old grandmother, and they will all be challenged by the Sweeper Tires, Slippery Swing Set and the Scary Go Round.

episodes.name: July 22, 2009
episodes.overview: 24 contestants, including a substitute teacher and a chef, face returning and new obstacles including the Log Roll, Wedge Turntables and the Fender Benders, all hoping to be the winning contestant of 50,000 dollars and becoming the "Wipeout Champion".

episodes.name: August 5, 2009: All-Stars
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: August 12, 2009
episodes.overview: Contestants include a deputy sheriff, a male nurse and an Irishman, facing such new obstacles as Sweeper Wall, Blue Ball Run and Dodge Ball Beam Walk, for a chance at winning $50,000 and the title of "Wipeout Champion".

episodes.name: August 26, 2009
episodes.overview: 24 contestants battle it out of $50,000 as the challenge the Ballsy-Go-Round, Mesh Mosh Run and Swinging Cereal Killer.

episodes.name: September 2, 2009
episodes.overview: A volleyball coach, a ninja and a hip-hop instructor are among the 24 new Americans facing the extreme obstacle course in Buenos Aires, Argentina. The obstacles they will face in order to win the 50,000 dollars and the title of "Wipeout Champion" include Brush Rush, Aqua Launch and Buoy Run.

episodes.name: September 9, 2009: Australia
episodes.overview: n this special edition of "Wipeout", Australians make a guest appearance. We will see them trying to conquer the new obstacle courses and we will see them falling off the Big Balls!

episodes.name: September 16, 2009
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The following is a comprehensive list of episodes from the second season of American game show Wipeout.

episodes.name: Wipeout Blind Date
episodes.overview: John Henson pairs up 12 single guys and 12 single girls to take on the "Wipeout" course as their first date and a chance to win a grand prize of $100,000.

episodes.name: Welcome Back America
episodes.overview:
"Wipeout" returns for Season Three, welcoming back America with an all-new course and qualifier stunts. The Fence Flapper, Double Cross and Bruiseball are three of the wild and outrageous new obstacles featured in the world's largest obstacle course contestants will face this season.

We've also raised the stakes with an all-new Wipeout Zone, and the fan favorite Big Balls are back, but with a twist - the Motivator is now the platform that contestants stand on, which sneaks up on them and smacks them from behind, hurling them on the Big Balls if they hesitate.

episodes.name: Anderson Can’t Dance
episodes.overview: Door Knock, Moving Big Balls and the Zip Line Shape Shifter are three of the wild and crazy new obstacles that contestants will face on "Wipeout," featuring the world's largest new obstacle course.

episodes.name: World Cup
episodes.overview: In celebration of the 2010 World Cup, "Wipeout's" signature obstacle -- Big Balls -- transforms into Big Soccer Balls that go head-to-head against contestants, along with the Trampoline Sweeper and the Fling Set, two of the new wild and crazy obstacles contestants will face this week on "Wipeout."

episodes.name: Excuse Wii
episodes.overview: Mid-Evil Wipe-a-Lot, Overdrive and the Circle Challenge are three new obstacles presented -- along with our 1,000th contestant -- on this week's Wipeout," featuring the world's largest new obstacle course.

episodes.name: Couples
episodes.overview: The old saying that Love Hurts' rings true, as daring couples literally go head over heels for one another and compete as a team against other couples, taking on the Blob Launch, Trampoline Shape Shifter and Bruiseball with Dodgeballs, on this week's episode of "Wipeout," featuring the world's largest new obstacle course.

episodes.name: The Henson Experiment
episodes.overview: Host John Henson will undoubtedly be laughing just a bit louder in this episode since he's the brains behind of one of its featured obstacles. About his creation he proclaims: "As an inventor, one hopes to create something that changes the course of mankind -- the wheel, the steam engine, the bedazzler. Today I am proud to present... the TRAMP-O-MEAN. Your move, Stephen Hawking." Diving Board Shape Shifter and Double Cross with Fire Hose are also among the new, wild and outrageous obstacles included in this week's episode of "Wipeout," featuring the world's largest obstacle course.

episodes.name: Feed Jill
episodes.overview: The Smack Wall Sweeper, Organ Grinder and BruiseBall with Dizzy Dummy are three new wild and wacky obstacles included on a new episode of "Wipeout," featuring the world's largest obstacle course.

episodes.name: The Wrecking Family
episodes.overview: Twenty-four contestants compete against each other and the clock to make it through wild obstacle courses to ultimately be one of the final 4. The final 4 then face the Wipeout Zone. The contestant with the fastest time wins $50,000

episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.overview: Twelve teams of family members compete in obstacles, including the Pitchfork Tumblers, Trampoline Sweeper and Fling Set.

Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The following is a comprehensive listing of all the episodes from the third season of American game show Wipeout.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Over the Big Balls to Nana's House We Go
episodes.overview: The fourth-season premiere is a winter version of the extreme obstacle course, featuring Spinning Ski Lift, Snowplow Sweeper and Big Balls with a new twist, the Snow-tivator.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: The Musical
episodes.overview: Obstacles include Mogul Madness and Yule Log Jam.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Don't Fear The Beaver
episodes.overview: Winter Wonder Planks, Ski Lift and Seven Letter Word are among the obstacles faced. Contestants include a rocket scientist, a dancer and a river guide with an extreme fear of beavers.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Baby It's Blob Outside
episodes.overview: Obstacles include Snowman Sweepers; the Winter Brrr Blob, which launches contestants 50 feet in the air; the Snowtivator and Big Balls. Contestants include the Last Human, Perfect 10 and the cute and tiny Mikachu.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Hockey Pucks And Bieber Fever
episodes.overview: The Gingerbread House, Big Balls, the Yule Log Jam and the Wipeout Ice Arena are among the obstacles faced.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: This Little Piggy Went To Wipeout
episodes.overview: Snowplow Sweeper, Wipeout Ski Lift and Holiday Hams are among obstacles faced by contestants, including the Hockey Hottie, Ripped Rhino and Mr. Grinch.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Some People Just Don't Know When To Quit
episodes.overview: Snowman Surprise, Yule Log Jam (where Booty Pop butts in) and Big Balls (with a dolphin impersonator chattering away) are among the obstacles faced. Contestants include Studly Student, Pretty Piggy and the Quitter.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Family Night, Kids Eat It For Free
episodes.overview: Family teams face off against each other and take on Snow Blower, Ski Lift and Alpine Village.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: The Birds, The Bees And The Bed Bugs
episodes.overview: Bed Bugs, Springavator, Big Balls and Trampoline Spring Fling are among the obstacles that contestants face before they are fed breakfast in the Wipeout Kitchen.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: Ballsy Shows Off His Giblets
episodes.overview: Flipsy Daisy, Spring Fling and Springtime in Paris are among the obstacles faced. Meanwhile, Ballsy is busy in the Wipeout Kitchen, serving up his famous giblets and other delicacies.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: John Henson, Zombie Hunter
episodes.overview: Scarecase, the Banana Split, the Diving Board Spring Fling and a gladiator-theme challenge are among the obstacles faced.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: The Wizard Of Owws
episodes.overview: A "Bowled Over" obstacle brings full body contact to bowling. Contestants also face the Chocolate Shop and an Arabian Nights-theme challenge.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: The Most Dramatic Rose Ceremony Ever
episodes.overview: Obstacles include a troublesome Qualifier, Big Balls, a Zip Line onto the Spring Fling, the Candy Store in the Wipeout Kitchen, Scareousel and the Supertramp Challenge. One contestant promises to propose to his girlfriend if he wins.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: Dirty Laundry
episodes.overview: Faulty Bridge, Twister Mill, Wipeout Laundromat, Scareousel and Super Tramp Challenge are among the obstacles faced.

episodes.name: Spring Wipeout: Engaged Couples
episodes.overview: A romantic obstacle course is tackled by twelve engaged couples, who will face the Love Boat Launch, the Springivator and a Wedding Cake Testing.

episodes.name: Summer Sneak Peek
episodes.overview: A preview of the summer session features a look at new obstacles, including the Wipeout Wall, the Flume of Doom, the Illusion-ator, Driver's Ed and the Wipeout Play Set.

episodes.name: Hotties Versus Nerds
episodes.overview: It's hotties vs. nerds in a battle of the sexes that includes such obstacles as the Wipeout Carwash, Total Carnage and the Wipeout Play Set.

episodes.name: Let's Make a Wipeout
episodes.overview: The Lawnmower, Big Balls, the Mood Swing and the Scareousel are among the obstacles faced.

episodes.name: At Full Tilt
episodes.overview: The Mood Swing is tipsy, the Qualifier plays Human Pinball with contestants and the Wipeout Kitchen serves Mexican food.

episodes.name: Wheel of Misfortune
episodes.overview: Wheel of Misfortune, Total Carnage, Wipeout Playset and Towering Flume of Doom are among the obstacles faced.

episodes.name: All-Stars
episodes.overview: Past contestants return to face the Double Sweeper Dive and a round of Jump the Shark for a shot at $50,000.

episodes.name: You're All Acting Like Babies!
episodes.overview: A socially awkward contestant, a high-school "clownselor" and a "bull-frog assassin" are served a baby-food smorgasbord and brave the sushi bar at the Wipeout Kitchen.

episodes.name: Boss and Employee
episodes.overview: Bosses and employees team up to tackle the obstacle course as X-Ray Men, Shock Jocks and Country Club Cuties face the Caterpillar, Total Carnage and a Detour to a Race Track.

episodes.name: Ballsy Gets a Hard Hat
episodes.overview: Total Carnage and Wipeout Carwash are among the obstacles faced by a retired rock star, a music man, a roadie, a cheerleader mom and a poker player.

episodes.name: Is That a Potato in Your Sack or Are You Just Happy to Wipeout?
episodes.overview: Kindergarten Chaos (complete with flying paint and dodgeballs) and a challenge that involves wearing a potato sack and braving an elevated sweeper arm are among the obstacles faced.

episodes.name: Bucking Broncos and Jiggling Monkeys
episodes.overview: Bucking Broncos and hurled horseshoes, a Monkey Jiggalator and pizza served up Double Barrel-style are among the obstacles.

episodes.name: Ballsy’s Playground
episodes.overview: The Road Trip and The Wipeout Zone are tackled by a sewer rat, a photobomber, a make-up artist and the brokenhearted.

episodes.name: Contestants Are Dropping Like Flies
episodes.overview: Contestants are swatted like flies; take a three-wheeled driver-education test; dive into the Double Barrell; and face sea sponges, Total Carnage and the Wipeout Playset.

episodes.name: The Family That Wipeouts Together
episodes.overview: Family duos brave the obstacles, including Double Bubble Trouble, the space-theme Double Barrel, Total Carnage and the Wipeout Playset.

episodes.name: Does This Avatar Make Me Look Fat?
episodes.overview: Twenty-four contestants compete against each other and the clock to make it through wild obstacle courses to ultimately be one of the final 4. The final 4 then face the Wipeout Zone. The contestant with the fastest time wins $50,000.

episodes.name: Blind Date 2.0: This Could Get Ugly
episodes.overview: Twenty-four contestants compete against each other and the clock to make it through wild obstacle courses to ultimately be one of the final 4. The final 4 then face the Wipeout Zone. The contestant with the fastest time wins $50,000.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Here is a comprehensive listing of all of the episodes from the fourth season of American game show Wipeout.

episodes.name: Winter Wipeout: Deck The Balls
episodes.overview: Contestants face the Nutcracker Sweet, Santa's Workshop and the Jingle Balls.

episodes.name: A Sight For Sore Ice
episodes.overview: The fifth season begins with a winter version that includes icy obstacles, such as the Snow Shovel Trouble, Pain in the Ice and Candy Pain Lane. Vanessa Lachey cohosts.

episodes.name: Ice, Ice Baby
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: Family Tree
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: Shoulda SAW That Coming
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day Couples
episodes.overview: Wipeout is an American reality show series in which contestants compete in what is billed as the "world's largest obstacle course". Wipeout is hosted and commentated by John Henson and John Anderson, while Vanessa Lachey acts as the "on-location" presenter. The former presenter was Jill Wagner.

episodes.name: That Snow Way to Fall Down
episodes.overview: Contestants encounter Garry the Eskimo as they tackle the Arctic Circle.

episodes.name: You Ain't Seen Nothing Yeti
episodes.overview: Contestants tackle obstacles while they are terrorized by yetis.

episodes.name: Hotties Versus Nerds 2.0
episodes.overview: The fifth summer season premieres with hotties vs. nerds in a battle of the sexes.

episodes.name: Wipeout Salutes the Armed Forces
episodes.overview: A military-themes edition features 24 members of the U.S. Armed Forces. Obstacles include: "Private Bee-jamin", "Drill Sergeant", and "Hangover".

episodes.name: Boss & Employee 2012
episodes.overview: Bosses and employees team up to tackle the obstacle course which includes the Corporate Ladder, the Pound About and Bigfoot. Among the contestants are the "cool coaches" and the "pranking pastors." (Special Tuesday 8 pm airing)

episodes.name: It's the John Henson Show
episodes.overview: Host John Henson puts his stamp on new obstacles, including Henson Headshots, Slappy Meal and the Spin Psycho.

episodes.name: Udderly Ridiculous
episodes.overview: Contestants compete on an extreme obstacle course for a $50,000 prize.

episodes.name: Gorillas in our Midst
episodes.overview: Competitors face obstacles including Monkey Business, School Daze and Gold Rush Petrified Forest.

episodes.name: Blind Date 2012
episodes.overview: Single men and women form teams of two and tackle obstacles that include Head Over Heels, Lovers Lane and the Wipeout Nursery

episodes.name: Batter Up
episodes.overview: Contestants, including Geriatric Groupie, Southern Belle and Cougar Hunter, take on obstacles Batter Up, Karate Class, Panic Hammocks and Spin Psycho.

episodes.name: Hillbilly Wipeout
episodes.overview: Title reference: Contestant Sheryl Crawford calls herself a hillbilly. Additionally, the "Hillbilly Mowdown" course in the 3rd round is introduced.

episodes.name: Winners and Losers
episodes.overview: Twelve Wipeout losers (as well as twelve of the 90+ champions) return to Wipeout.

episodes.name: Uncle Stevie's Squid Pit and BBQ
episodes.overview: Contestants face obstacles including Boat Bouys, Swept Away, Ocean Commotion and Panic Hammocks.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: Contestants face obstacles that include Aunt Patty Cake and the Lumberjerks.

episodes.name: Snakes on the Plains
episodes.overview: Contestants face obstacles including Snakes on the Plains, Pulling Teeth and the Hangover.

episodes.name: Rats!
episodes.overview: Contestants face obstacles including Surf's Up, Wipeout Subway Car and the Caregrounds.

episodes.name: Showdown at the Wipeout Saloon
episodes.overview: A Western-theme obstacle course includes a showdown with Toby, a giant gunslinger. Other hurdles include Cactus Chaos and Spin Psycho.

episodes.name: Back To School: Students' Revenge
episodes.overview: Stephanie Pokswinski is the final contestant this season to earn 500 dollars for tagging Smallsy. Unfortunately, she failed to advance.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: This is a comprehensive list of all of the episodes from the fifth season of American game-show Wipeout.

episodes.name: Welcome Back, Jill
episodes.overview: **Duplicate Listing**

episodes.name: Night of the Living Big Balls
episodes.overview: Contestants encounter zombies as they tackle obstacles that include the Pork Chopper, the Tropic Blunder and Tongue Twisters.

episodes.name: Senior Citizens, Kids and Convicts
episodes.overview: John Henson reveals a slew of wild ideas for contestants; players tackle the Killer Croc and bust out of Wipeout Jail.

episodes.name: Wipeout Family Values
episodes.overview: Teams of two family members tackle obstacles that include It's No Picnic, Aunt Patty Cake and Octopushy.

episodes.name: Boss & Employee: Third Shift
episodes.overview: Teams of bosses and employees tackle obstacles like Cuckoo Crazy, the Wipeout Break Room and the Miami Pound Machine.

episodes.name: Brains vs. Brawn
episodes.overview: Contestants with brainy jobs go head to head with beefed-up hard bodies; obstacles include the Wipeout Construction Zone, Owws and Zen, and the Miami Pound Machine.

episodes.name: The Ex Games
episodes.overview: Teams of exes face obstacles, including Miami Pound Machine and Sugar Smacks.

episodes.name: Newlyweds: Love and Other Wipeouts
episodes.overview: Twelve just-married couples tackle obstacles that include the Cradle of Tough Love and the Honeymoon in Paree.

episodes.name: Cat-Face Shirt!
episodes.overview: Contestants tackle obstacles that include Wipeout's Jet Skis, Fail Boat, the Miami Pound Machine and Wipeout City's Window Washers.

episodes.name: Big Balls of the Carribean
episodes.overview: Contestants dace obstacles, including Squashbuckler, Backyard BBQ and Octopushy.

episodes.overview: Contestants tackle obstacles that include The Tether Beater, Trippity Skippity Flippity Doo and Wipeout Break-ery.

episodes.name: Beauty Queen
episodes.overview: Former beauty pageant contestants face obstacles including Tropic Blunder, Chopping Mall and Miami Pound Machine.

episodes.name: How Jill Got Her Groove Back
episodes.overview: Contestants tackle obstacles which include Wipeout Dump, Sushi Bar and Octopushy.

episodes.name: Blind Date: Even Blinder
episodes.overview: Couples on blind dates tackle obstacles that include Love Birds, Ant Farm and Spinning Sweeper arms; contestants can win $5,000 during a special, no-elimination round.

episodes.name: Hotties vs. Nerds 3.0
episodes.overview: Twelve nerds and 12 beauties battle it out as they face obstacles that include Medieval Castle, Candy Shop and Octopushy.

episodes.name: It's a Dirty Job but Someone's Gotta Wipeout
episodes.overview: Contestants who have made careers out of their own dirty jobs get messy on the course; obstacles include Pooper Scooper, Bustodian and Roach Poacher.

episodes.name: Fall in the Family
episodes.overview: The 7th season begins with a family edition, featuring 12 teams of two family members. Obstacles include: Big Balls Bonanza; the Shed Zone; and the Classic Sweeper.

episodes.name: Hotties vs. Nerds 4.0
episodes.overview: It's hotties vs. nerds in a battle to determine whether looks or brainpower is superior. Obstacles include Robo-Bistro and Space Race.

episodes.name: Boss & Employee: Big Balls, Inc.
episodes.overview: Bosses and employees form teams and tackle obstacles that include The Pink Slip, The Playpound and The Smallsy Factory.

episodes.name: My So-Bald Life
episodes.overview: Contestants try their luck at obstacles that include Wipeout Shores and Dracula's Condo; one contestant wins the cash prize and a chance to take part in the Tournament of Champions.

episodes.name: Fraternity vs Sorority
episodes.overview: In the first ever “Fraternity Vs. Sorority” edition of Wipeout, twenty-four contestants vie for a cash prize as they take on the fan-favorite “Suckerpunch 2.0,” enjoy some vacation time at “Spring Broken” and battle the “Fun Slides, Platforms, Spinning Purple People Beater.” Our collegiate stars include “Ultimate Bro,” “Awkward Dancer” and “Little Sister.”

episodes.name: Tournament of Champions
episodes.overview: Winners from throughout the season compete to be crowned Ultimate Wipeout Champion.
